item.title: Skate Players Aren’t Happy With Dead Space Skin
item.description:
Skate players are voicing their frustrations after the free-to-play reboot released a brand-new Dead Space bundle. The catch is that Skate players need to pay $35 to skateboard around San Vansterdam while dressed as a cardboard-style version of Isaac Clarke, which is not cheap at all.

It was initially announced that Skate would be a live-service free-to-play game over three years ago. Long-time fans of the series raised concerns about what that could mean about its monetization strategy back then, too, with paid character skins feeling like the obvious route EA could potentially take with its live-service reboot. Those concerns have seemingly come to fruition with the latest Dead Space bundle.

Skate Players Are Annoyed At Dead Space Bundle's $35 Price Tag

A Reddit thread started by user Parzalai highlighted that a new Skate skin bundle based on EA franchise Dead Space costs 3,350 San Van Bucks, which costs a minimum of $35 to buy in the in-game store. Predictably, fans aren't happy, with many lamenting the "outrageous pricing" of the bundle, which includes a skateboard, an emote, various stickers, and a cardboard-style character skin based on Dead Space protagonist Isaac Clarke.

It isn't just the high cost of the bundle that is setting players off, either. The appearance of the Isaac Clarke skin, which appears to be more of a Halloween-style cardboard costume as opposed to his actual Dead Space armor, hasn't gone down well. Described by one player as "slop cosplay with cardboard and tape," fans lamented that Skate 3 had a free Isaac Clarke skin 15 years ago, based on his actual in-game armor, and "not some kid’s attempt at a cardboard box halloween costume." Given Skate 's mixed reviews on launch, it doesn't feel as though this bundle really helps matters in the eyes of the player base.

That Skate already has cosmetics to buy is controversial in its own right - the game is still very much in Early Access, and seems to be a long way from release at the moment. Regardless, with the arrival of Skate Season 1, EA and developer Full Circle has the opportunity to continue improving the game and its currently mixed reputation.

12
7.3 /10

skate.

item.title: Roblox: Sing It Karaoke Battles Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Jump Links

  • All Sing It Karaoke Battles Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Sing It Karaoke Battles
  • How to Get More Sing It Karaoke Battles Codes

Sing It Karaoke Battles is literally karaoke in the form of a Roblox experience, which already has more than 900 songs that you can sing alone or compete with others. In competitive mode, each player will get their moment of glory, and the one who scores the most Cheers wins.

Cheers is the main currency in the game, which acts as rating points and your ranking in the leaderboard. In addition to participating in karaoke battles, you can get Cheers by redeeming Sing It Karaoke Battles codes, which is a great alternative.

Updated October 8, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Sing It Karaoke Battles has several active codes that reward you with Cheers and exclusive titles. Redeeming them helps you show off your achievements and gain extra in-game perks. Keep an eye on updates, as new codes are often released to celebrate milestones or events.

All Sing It Karaoke Battles Codes

Working Sing It Karaoke Battles Codes

  • 100MilVisits - Redeem this code to get free rewards. (NEW)
  • JUSTSINGTHESONG - Redeem this code to get "#NOFREESTYLE" and "JustSingTheSong" Titles.
  • release - Redeem this code to get 100 Cheers.
  • newmap - Redeem this code to get 300 Cheers.
  • ilovesingit - Redeem this code to get "I

Expired Sing It Karaoke Battles Codes

There are currently no expired Sing It Karaoke Battles codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Sing It Karaoke Battles codes will bring you not only Cheers, but also other useful rewards. It all depends on the code, but in addition to the aforementioned currency, you can also get, for example, a title that you can then equip to stand out from the crowd.

How to Redeem Codes for Sing It Karaoke Battles

Redeeming Sing It Karaoke Battles codes will take you a few seconds. The redemption option is simple and straightforward, just like in most other Roblox games, but if you are having difficulty, here is a guide to help you know how to proceed:

  • Launch Sing It Karaoke Battles .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in a column. Among them, interact with the first one which says Shop.
  • This will open the Shop menu. Here, interact with the Promo Codes option. The corresponding button is located in the upper right corner of the menu.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a colored Enter button below it. Now, enter one of the working codes from the list above into the input field.
  • Lastly, press the colored Enter button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen with a list of rewards you have received.

How to Get More Sing It Karaoke Battles Codes

Sing It Karaoke Battles codes are very valuable, so it's no surprise that each one is a one-time use. If you have used all the Roblox codes on your account and want more, you can look for them on the official pages of the game. From time to time, the developers share various announcements and news here, including codes.

  • Official Sing It Karaoke Battles Roblox group.
  • Official Sing It Karaoke Battles Discord server.

item.title: 4 Soulslike Games That Are Officially Harder Than Dark Souls
item.description:
Dark Souls is known for many things, but aside from ushering in an entirely new genre, many people associate the name with difficulty. The game demands concentration on another level, pushing players to their physical and mental limits, as well as punishing their mistakes from start to finish.

But despite it practically being the poster child for the challenge, there are a few other games out there that are rated slightly higher on the difficulty scale. Some come from FromSoftware's expansive catalog, and others are entirely different developers who have managed to show that, with enough talent and motivation, a world-class Soulslike can be made by someone other than the original creators.

Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice

The Premier Soulslike Challenge

Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
20
9.5 /10
Released
March 22, 2019

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Violence
Developer(s)
From Software
Platform(s)
PS4, PC, Xbox One
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by
  • Difficulty Rating : 4.49/5

Sekiro abandons the stamina-driven combat of Dark Souls in favor of razor-sharp parries and breakneck speed. Success depends not on cautious strikes but on perfectly timed deflections that punish hesitation, and many veterans of the genre have said that this game blows every other title out of the park in terms of difficulty.

Bosses are merciless, demanding mastery of mechanics with little room for error. The healing is limited, and death often resets hard-earned progress towards taking down that next big barrier. It’s a game that rewards only perfect execution, earning its reputation as FromSoftware’s most unforgiving creation.

Dark Souls 2

Testing Patience More Than Ever

Dark Souls 2
9 /10
12
8.3 /10
Released
March 11, 2014

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T for Teen: Blood and Gore, Mild Language, Partial Nudity, Violence
Platform(s)
PS4, PS3, Xbox 360, PC, Xbox One
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by
  • Difficulty Rating : 4.34/5

Often called the black sheep of the franchise, Dark Souls 2 followed up the breakout hit with a larger world full of even more threats and a huge list of bosses for players to learn and challenge. The real difficulty comes from the number of enemies and their placements, as well as a few extra mechanics like hollowing, which made deaths even more frustrating than they already were.

Its punishing design forces players to adapt to grueling encounters and unpredictable pacing in a way that the other games just simply didn't demand. With sprawling areas filled with traps, mobs, and at times, some pretty unfair encounters, Dark Souls 2 remains one of the toughest entries out there for newcomers and returning players alike.

Nioh 2

A Rare Perfect Follow-up

Nioh 2
8 /10
8.8 /10
Released
March 13, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ due to Blood and Gore, Suggestive Themes, Violence
Developer(s)
Team Ninja
Platform(s)
PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by
  • Difficulty Rating : 4.30/5

Nioh 2 blends soulslike structure with fast-paced, combo-heavy combat that demands split-second reflexes and a wide knowledge set to fully succeed. Players must juggle stances, manage Ki, and master a vast arsenal of weapons while facing off against ferocious yokai in a world that is both horrifying and deeply challenging.

The difficulty is amplified by intricate systems and punishing bosses that strike with overwhelming force. Even minor enemies can tear unprepared players apart in a matter of moments, requiring them to prepare for the worst at all times. It’s a game that rewards obsessive dedication, with a challenge level that surpasses Dark Souls in both complexity and intensity.

Dark Souls 3

Ending A Phenomenal Era

Dark Souls 3
8 /10
20
9.4 /10
Released
March 24, 2016

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood Violence
Developer(s)
From Software
Platform(s)
PS4, Xbox One, PC
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by
  • Difficulty Rating : 4.34/5

Dark Souls 3 pushes the series to new levels of difficulty by accelerating combat to new speeds and expanding boss designs to new heights. The pace leaves little room for recovery, forcing players to respond instantly or face defeat, and the number of moves that each enemy and boss has means that players can never let their guard down.

Bosses are among the most brutal in the series, often chaining attacks with barely a pause. The later areas pile on relentless encounters, demanding stamina and precision from start to finish, and a level of attention that has virtually never been surpassed since. For many, Dark Souls 3 represents the franchise at its hardest, surpassing its predecessors through sheer intensity, and rounding out one of gaming's most beloved trilogies in style.

item.title: Roblox: Fat Training Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Fat Training offers players an unusual training simulator. Instead of doing exercises, you have to eat food and gain weight. The bigger you are, the faster you can roll during races. And to speed up your progress a little, you can use Fat Training codes.

Each of these Roblox codes will reward you with useful goodies. But most of them contain Gems. Also, you will want to hurry to redeem them before they expire.

Updated October 8, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Fat Training offers several codes that reward you with Gems and useful weapons to help you grow stronger. You can use them to boost your progress and unlock better gear as you train. Check back later to see if new codes appear for more rewards.

All Fat Training Codes

Working Fat Training Codes

  • 100LIKES - Redeem this code to get 10 Gems and common Short Swords
  • welcome - Redeem this code to get 50 Gems and common Short Swords
  • 1KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 40 Gems and a rare Clover

Expired Fat Training Codes

There are no expired codes in Fat Training . We will update this article as soon as more code becomes available.

If you're familiar with training simulators, then the gameplay of Fat Training won't be new to you. Players only need to train to earn Energy and then participate in races to earn Wins. The latter is an important currency for purchasing new pets and upgrading your character. However, at first, players will have a hard time progressing quickly. To fix this, you'll want to use the help of Fat Training codes.

Even a few codes will be enough to significantly speed up your progression, since in addition to Gems, they contain equipment items. Each of them passively increases your stats, such as Luck, when hatching pet eggs. However, after a while, these Roblox codes expire, and the rewards will no longer be available.

How to Redeem Fat Training Codes

Luckily, the code redemption feature in Fat Training is no more difficult than in most other Roblox games. You only need to make a few clicks to get free goodies. Moreover, this option is available as soon as you spawn on the server:

  • Launch Fat Training .
  • Next, click on the gear in the lower right corner of the screen and go to the Code tab.
  • After that, enter the code in the field and click claim to receive rewards from the developers.

How to Get More Fat Training Codes

Now that you know how to use Fat Training codes, you will want to know how to find more. We recommend you visit the official developers' social media pages. There, they post all the news about the game, including new updates and events:

  • Camron X page
  • Habit Games Roblox Discord server

item.title: Roblox: Supermarket Simulator Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Roblox is a platform that allows you to experience many different professions, and if you've ever wanted to be a store owner, then Supermarket Simulator is the perfect game for you. Here, you will need to buy different goods and sell them to your customers to make a profit. In games like this, having a decent starting capital can help you progress faster and next we will tell you how to get some money for free. Here we will talk about Supermarket Simulator codes and explain to you how to redeem them.

Updated October 8, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Supermarket Simulator currently features a few active codes that reward you with extra in-game cash. Redeeming them can give your store a quick financial boost to help expand your business or restock faster. These codes are updated from time to time, so it’s good to keep an eye out for new ones. Be sure to revisit later for more rewards and future updates.

All Supermarket Simulator Codes

Working Supermarket Simulator Codes

  • Outstanding – Gives you 1400 Cash. (NEW)
  • Incredible – Gives you 1200 Cash.

Expired Supermarket Simulator Codes

  • Unbelievable
  • Wonderful
  • Great
  • Impressive
  • Amazing
  • Super
  • 3klikes

In Supermarket Simulator , you will get your own shop that you can expand and upgrade. You will have to purchase various goods and earn Cash by selling them to your customers. After that, you will be able to use this money to buy more stuff for your supermarket.

Cash is an extremely important currency in Supermarket Simulator and some promo codes give you money for free. So, we highly recommend you redeem them as soon as possible to get a better start. With the help of these coupons, you will be able to purchase more different goods and significantly increase your income.

How to Redeem Supermarket Simulator Codes

Promo codes in Supermarket Simulator work exactly the same as in most other Roblox games. They allow you to get some free rewards if you know how the redemption process works. Fortunately, it is very simple and you just need to click a few buttons to obtain your freebies. Here is a list of steps you need to follow to redeem Supermarket Simulator codes:

  • Launch Supermarket Simulator and wait for this Roblox experience to load.
  • After that, complete the tutorial and click on the Z button.
  • Type the code you want to use in the menu that pops up after clicking on the Z button.
  • Click on the Enter button.
  • The reward is yours.

How to Get New Supermarket Simulator Codes

The developers of Supermarket Simulator can release new Roblox promo codes, and if they do, we will add them to our article. You can bookmark this guide and check it for updates from time to time. We will keep you updated on all the new freebies in this Roblox experience.
